name: Grapple Point
description: This is just an alpha of the game but the main idea is play around with your friends with a Gun and grappling hook. You can swing around platforms and bars or grapple around a whole city. There's multiple game modes especially coming to the new update v1.4 and v1.5 like Shootout(You have a gun), Tag(You play, well a game of Tag) and the floor is lava race(you have to race to the top against friends to survive and finally black hole(You have to survive a black hole against your friends) These are all the planned game mode but more will come out and all these game modes will of course be played with a grappling hook as i decided that would be very fun  multiplayer is used by dedicated servers meaning people have to host a server and your friends join, if you can't play worth friends there will be some single player maps to swing around in . This game is about fast speed and action so if your into that make sure to check out this game. (Keep in mind this game is in Alpha v 0.3)
